page.title: 14 CHURCHES IN LIGHTCLIFFE
page.content: There are 3 churches in Lightcliffe, Methodist, U.R.C. and Church of England. The vicar of the Church of England is Mr.Wilding,the service starts at 10:15am and there is a youth group on Sunday evenings. The U.R.C. Minster is Mr. Neems, who in June 1985, came back from a course in Nazareth. The service starts at 11:00am and there is a youth group for young children, 6-12, called pilots,and Fury for teenagers. The Methodist service starts at 10:30am .The Minister is Rev.R.Yates and they have a youth group and a young people's group called Junior Guild.
